chunks.zh: 想了解下大家早餐一般花多少钱？
chunks.en: I'd like to know how much everyone usually spends on breakfast?

chunks.zh: 今天早上买早餐时换了一个早餐店，买了三个小包子和一个茶叶蛋花费 12 元。
chunks.en: This morning I tried a different breakfast shop and spent 12 yuan on three small steamed buns and a tea egg.

chunks.zh: 个人觉得价格很贵，突发奇想想了解下大家对于早餐的期望开支大概是多少，对我来说 10 开头就算贵了😂
chunks.en: I personally think it's expensive. I suddenly had the idea to understand everyone's expected breakfast spending. For me, anything starting with 10 yuan is considered expensive 😂

chunks.zh: 20-25, McDonald or KFC
chunks.en: 20-25, McDonald's or KFC

chunks.zh: 不吃
chunks.en: Don't eat

chunks.zh: @chen15798 淘宝 首页找 [领淘金] ，点进去搜 [麦当劳早餐] ，选个合适的下单，具体怎么兑换看商品详情
chunks.en: @chen15798 On Taobao's homepage, find [领淘金], click in and search for [McDonald's Breakfast], select a suitable one to order, and see the product details for how to redeem it.

chunks.zh: 每天早餐 40+，大家乐
chunks.en: 40+ for breakfast every day, at Cafe de Coral

chunks.zh: 今天 8 块，罗森 - 菜包+花卷+流沙包
chunks.en: 8 yuan today, Lawson - Vegetable Bun + Steamed Twisted Roll + Custard Bun

chunks.zh: 4 块，一个粉丝豆腐包一个茶叶蛋
chunks.en: 4 yuan, one vermicelli tofu bun and one tea egg

chunks.zh: 今天 5 块，东北大饼连锁店 3 元的饼+速溶咖啡 2 元
chunks.en: 5 yuan today, a 3 yuan pancake from a Northeast pancake chain store + 2 yuan instant coffee

chunks.zh: 全家的一个包子 2.8
chunks.en: One bun from FamilyMart, 2.8 yuan

chunks.zh: 一般早上两个肉包一个水煮蛋，4.5 ，肉包 1.5/个，水煮蛋 1.5/个，没买豆浆牛奶，买的话差不多六七块，现在都是到办公室喝水代奶了，感觉算是较低了
chunks.en: Usually two meat buns and a boiled egg in the morning, 4.5 yuan in total. Meat buns are 1.5 yuan each, boiled egg is 1.5 yuan. I didn't buy soy milk or milk, if I did it would be around six or seven yuan. Now I just drink water at the office instead of milk, I feel like it's considered low.

chunks.zh: 我早餐一般吃很少，五块钱左右。
chunks.en: I usually eat very little for breakfast, around five yuan.

chunks.zh: 有时候自己带个奶+蛋，没带就去三津汤包买个豆浆+馒头
chunks.en: Sometimes I bring my own milk + egg. If I don't, I go to Sanjin Tangbao and buy soy milk + steamed bun.

chunks.zh: 两根蛋白棒，加起来不到 10 块
chunks.en: Two protein bars, less than 10 yuan in total

chunks.zh: 起得早的话来单位食堂，2 根油条+1 碗小米粥+1 个煮鸡蛋+1 份小咸菜，2.8 元
chunks.en: If I get up early, I go to the company cafeteria, 2 fried dough sticks + 1 bowl of millet porridge + 1 boiled egg + 1 portion of small pickles, 2.8 yuan

chunks.zh: 一碗粥，一个包子，4 块
chunks.en: A bowl of porridge, a steamed bun, 4 yuan

chunks.zh: 吃了快一年麦当劳，15 不到。
chunks.en: I've been eating McDonald's for almost a year, less than 15 yuan.

chunks.zh: 包子+鸡蛋+豆浆  食堂 4-5 块吧
chunks.en: Steamed bun + egg + soy milk, probably 4-5 yuan in the cafeteria

chunks.zh: 两个青菜包子，3 块
chunks.en: Two vegetable buns, 3 yuan

chunks.zh: 煮个鸡蛋，牛奶泡麦片或者 牛奶加土司夹煎蛋，成本 5 元左右吃饱吃好还富含蛋白质
chunks.en: Boil an egg, soak oatmeal in milk or milk + toast with fried egg, the cost is about 5 yuan to eat well and be full of protein

chunks.zh: 食堂一份肠粉 7 块，有菜有肉很良心
chunks.en: A serving of rice noodle roll in the cafeteria is 7 yuan, with vegetables and meat, very conscientious

chunks.zh: @672795574 #2 同罗森，最近外勤这附近没像样的早餐店只能吃罗森，最起码价格能接受😂
chunks.en: @672795574 #2 Same as Lawson, recently working outside and there are no decent breakfast shops nearby, so I can only eat Lawson. At least the price is acceptable 😂
